January 11, 2011

Seven Best Things of Twenty-Ten

Parallaxing with jQuery and semantic markup

This past weekend I had some free time between playing Braid and eating, so I decided to dive into a personal one-off site. I was searching for inspiration when I came across Ian Coyle's NikeBetterWorld. It uses a vertical parallax of sorts and I figured I could use a similar technique as a framework to start from.  

Since we just entered a new year I figured why not do a reflection on what my favorite things of 2010 were.

Using some very light jQuery and simple markup I cooked up something I think looks pretty awesome. A quick list of what my favorites were:

  1. Graduated college
  2. Got hired by ZURB
  3. Travelled to the Bahamas
  4. Learned to code like a champ
  5. Games + Media (Braid for XBOX, Inception & Mashups)
  6. I started sketching again
  7. The beginning of my adult life

Check out the site now »

I had a great past year and am really looking forward to 2011.
